subject: Running
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt easily won his first heat in the 100 meters, and Kenya swept the women’s marathon and 10,000 meters on the first day of the track and field world championships.
snippet: Usain Bolt easily won his first heat in the 100 meters, and Kenya swept the women’s marathon and 10,000 meters on the first day of the track and field world championships.
